ygData.subject: Re: MoST - Model State Transfer (was Pure-REST Wiki experiment)

MoST is either ReST with additional constraints to achieve much greater 
levels of visibility or MoST supercedes ReST because ReST is useful only 
for web publishing and we want more.

I don't have a huge stake in defining ReST one way or another.  My personal 
view is that ReST is sufficiently semantically incoherent so you can go in 
whatever direction you like.  Try reading Roy's dissertation and figuring 
out the exact meaning of resource and representation in his paper and 
you'll see what I mean.



-Alex-
